Class Date

java.lang.Object
eventorganizer.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Writing our own Date class to initialize dates and check for validity
Author:
Daniel Guan, Palak Singh

      Returns:
